      protected int dstSavings
      DST Savings Time offset in milliseconds between Daylight Savings and Standard time for BackendTimeZoneSimple
      protected java.lang.String id
      Timezone ID ID of the BackendTimeZoneSimple (e.g., America/New York)

      Raw Offset Milliseconds offset between BackendTimeZoneSimple and Greenwich Mean Time

      Short Daylight Savings Daylight Savings abbreviation for BackendTimeZoneSimple, e.g., EDT
